channel.title: Root Container - Ebiten UI
channel.description: 1func main() { 2 ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled) 3 if err := ebiten.RunGame(&Game{}); err != nil { 4 log.Fatal(err) 5 } 6} 7 8type Game struct { 9 root *ebitenui.UI 10} 11 12func (g *Game) Update() error { 13 g.root.Update() 14 return nil 15} 16 17func (g *Game) Draw(screen *ebiten.Image) { 18 g.root.Draw(screen) 19} 20 21func (g *Game) Layout(w, h int) (int, int) { 22 return w, h 23}
